Class OrganizationRest

  • java.lang.Object
    • gov.dhs.kudos.rest.v1.OrganizationRest

  • @RestController
@RequestMapping(value="/v1/org")
public class OrganizationRest
extends java.lang.Object
    Restful v1 endpoint for handling all organization transactions

      • updateOrg

                method=POST,
                produces="application/json")
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity updateOrg(@RequestBody(required=false)
                                                               Organization org)
        Endpoint for updating an organization
        Parameters:
        org - The RequestBody object containing an organization - must contain id
        Returns:
        The updated organization object

      • orgAddUser

        @RequestMapping(value="/addUser/{orgName}",
                method=POST,
                produces="application/json")
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity orgAddUser(@PathVariable
                                                                java.lang.String orgName,
                                                                @RequestBody(required=false)
                                                                User user)
        Endpoint for adding a user to an organization
        Parameters:
        orgName - The PathVariable of the organizations name
        user - The RequestBody object containing a user - must be valid user, organization must exists, and user must not already be a member
        Returns:
        The updated organization object

      • orgCloneUser

        @RequestMapping(value="/cloneCat/{catId}/{orgName}",
                method=POST,
                produces="application/json")
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity orgCloneUser(@PathVariable
                                                                  java.lang.String catId,
                                                                  @PathVariable
                                                                  java.lang.String orgName)
        Endpoint for cloning a kudos category into an organization
        Parameters:
        catId - The PathVariable id of the kudos category to clone
        orgName - The PathVariable organization to clone the kudos category into
        Returns:
        The updated organization object

      • orgCreateCat

        @RequestMapping(value="/createCat/{orgName}",
                method=POST,
                produces="application/json")
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity orgCreateCat(@PathVariable
                                                                  java.lang.String orgName,
                                                                  @RequestBody(required=false)
                                                                  KudosCategory kudosCat)
        Endpoint for creating a new kudos category for an organization
        Parameters:
        orgName - The PathVariable name of the organization that will have the new kudos category
        kudosCat - The RequestBody of the new kudos category object
        Returns:
        The updated organization object
